This page is about trend in the number of COVID-19 cases in the US

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(rvest)
```

Import data
```{r}
covid_time = read_csv("data/covid_daily_cases.csv", skip = 2) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("month","day","year")) %>% 
  mutate(month = factor(month, levels = month.abb)) %>% 
  select(year, month, day, new_cases) %>% 
  group_by(year, month) %>% 
  arrange(year, month, day)
```
